SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Event
Models a game lifecycle in the TicTacToe game, tracking events from initial invitation through completion or termination.
Event.EventStatus
Enumeration defining the possible states of a game event throughout its lifecycle.
GamingResponse
Models the server's response to a REQUEST_MOVE request in the TicTacToe game.
Request
Models all client requests sent to the server in the TicTacToe game system.
Request.RequestType
Enumeration defining all possible request types that clients can send to the server.
Response
Models all server responses to client requests in the TicTacToe game system.
Response.ResponseStatus
Enumeration defining the possible status values for server responses.
ServerHandler
Handles I/O communication between the server and a single client connection.
SocketServer
The main socket server controller class for the TicTacToe game server.
User
Models a user who plays the TicTacToe game.
